Description: a text channel within a server
a voice channel within a server
a direct message between multiple users
a channel that [users can follow and crosspost into their own server](https://support.discordapp.com/hc/en-us/articles/360032008192)
a channel in which game developers can [sell their game on Discord](https://discordapp.com/developers/docs/game-and-server-management/special-channels)
